game.text: Good morning!  It's a brand new day.
After struggling out of bed, it's time to get yourself in the mood to take on the day.  You decide to make yourself some...
Huh... You really were expecting to feel... something.  Oh well.
Now that you're up, it's time to get at it.  You decide to go to...
After a long day, it's time to...
